about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This road sign means:

about.name: This road sign means:

hasPart.assesses: This road sign means: | This road sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates the presence of a crosswalk, regardless of if it is marked on the pavement or not. Upon seeing this sign, you should be alert and allow any pedestrians to cross the road safely.

comment.text: School crossing.
Pedestrian crossing.
Jogging trail.
Pedestrian crossing.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates the presence of a crosswalk, regardless of if it is marked on the pavement or not. Upon seeing this sign, you should be alert and allow any pedestrians to cross the road safely.

comment.text: This road sign means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates the presence of a crosswalk, regardless of if it is marked on the pavement or not. Upon seeing this sign, you should be alert and allow any pedestrians to cross the road safely.

hasPart.text: A sign that says to "yield" means that you must slow down and be ready to stop to let any vehicle, bicyclist, or pedestrian pass before you proceed. After yielding, you may follow the remaining directions on the sign.

suggestedAnswer.text: May turn left only on a green arrow.

comment.text: May turn left only on a green arrow.

suggestedAnswer.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

comment.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

suggestedAnswer.text: Must wait for the solid green light before you turn left.

comment.text: Must wait for the solid green light before you turn left.

acceptedAnswer.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

comment.text: May turn left on a green light when it is safe.

answerExplanation.text: A sign that says to "yield" means that you must slow down and be ready to stop to let any vehicle, bicyclist, or pedestrian pass before you proceed. After yielding, you may follow the remaining directions on the sign.

comment.text: This white sign means you: | A sign that says to "yield" means that you must slow down and be ready to stop to let any vehicle, bicyclist, or pedestrian pass before you proceed. After yielding, you may follow the remaining directions on the sign.

hasPart.name: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive?

about.name: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive?

hasPart.assesses: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive? | Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A number of drugs can impair your ability to drive, including depressant medications like tranquilizers and sedatives; over-the-counter cough syrups, cold tablets, and allergy medications (which may contain impairing substances like alcohol, codeine, or antihistamines); and illegal drugs.

comment.text: Tranquilizers, marijuana, and sedatives.

suggestedAnswer.text: Cough syrups and cold tablets containing codeine or antihistamines.

comment.text: Cough syrups and cold tablets containing codeine or antihistamines.
All of the above.
All of the above.

answerExplanation.text: A number of drugs can impair your ability to drive, including depressant medications like tranquilizers and sedatives; over-the-counter cough syrups, cold tablets, and allergy medications (which may contain impairing substances like alcohol, codeine, or antihistamines); and illegal drugs.

comment.text: Which of the following substances can affect the ability to drive? | A number of drugs can impair your ability to drive, including depressant medications like tranquilizers and sedatives; over-the-counter cough syrups, cold tablets, and allergy medications (which may contain impairing substances like alcohol, codeine, or antihistamines); and illegal drugs.

about.name: This sign is a warning that you are approaching:

hasPart.assesses: This sign is a warning that you are approaching: | This sign is a warning that you are approaching: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A round sign means you are approaching a railroad crossing. This sign is posted a few hundred feet in front of the tracks and tells drivers to slow down, look, listen, and prepare to stop.

comment.text: An intersection.
A crosswalk.
A railroad crossing.
A railroad crossing.

answerExplanation.text: A round sign means you are approaching a railroad crossing. This sign is posted a few hundred feet in front of the tracks and tells drivers to slow down, look, listen, and prepare to stop.

hasPart.name: When driving at night, you should:

about.name: When driving at night, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When driving at night, you should: | When driving at night, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Increase your following distance when it is difficult to see due to darkness. Use headlights to increase visibility, following the rules for proper use of high beams and low beams. Avoid looking directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle to avoid being blinded by the glare.

comment.text: Always use your high beams.

suggestedAnswer.text: Look directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle.

comment.text: Look directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle.
Increase your following distance.
Increase your following distance.

answerExplanation.text: Increase your following distance when it is difficult to see due to darkness. Use headlights to increase visibility, following the rules for proper use of high beams and low beams. Avoid looking directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle to avoid being blinded by the glare.

comment.text: When driving at night, you should: | Increase your following distance when it is difficult to see due to darkness. Use headlights to increase visibility, following the rules for proper use of high beams and low beams. Avoid looking directly at the headlights of an oncoming vehicle to avoid being blinded by the glare.

hasPart.assesses: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are: | It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are: - Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, or turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

suggestedAnswer.text: in need of the space and the bike lane is empty.

comment.text: in need of the space and the bike lane is empty.
Passing another vehicle

suggestedAnswer.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

comment.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

acceptedAnswer.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

comment.text: Parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

answerExplanation.text: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, or turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

comment.text: It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are: | It is illegal to drive in a bicycle lane unless you are parking (where permitted), entering or leaving the road, or turning (within 200 feet of an intersection).

hasPart.name: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body.

about.name: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body.

hasPart.assesses: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body. | Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body. -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: The only way to sober up after drinking alcohol is to allow time for your body to eliminate the alcohol in your system. Nothing you can do, including eating and drinking, can accelerate this process.

comment.text: Drinking caffeine
Eating foods high in fat
Time
Time

answerExplanation.text: The only way to sober up after drinking alcohol is to allow time for your body to eliminate the alcohol in your system. Nothing you can do, including eating and drinking, can accelerate this process.

comment.text: Only ____ can lower blood alcohol concentration (BAC) and reduce alcohol's effects on a body. | The only way to sober up after drinking alcohol is to allow time for your body to eliminate the alcohol in your system. Nothing you can do, including eating and drinking, can accelerate this process.

hasPart.name: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do?

about.name: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do?

hasPart.assesses: A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do? | A police officer is signaling for you to continue driving through a red light. What should you do? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: You must obey any traffic direction, order, or signal given by a traffic officer, peace officer, or firefighter, even if it conflicts with existing signs, signals, or laws.

suggestedAnswer.text: Do as the officer tells you.

comment.text: Do as the officer tells you.
Wait for the green light.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop first, then do what the officer tells you.

comment.text: Stop first, then do what the officer tells you.

acceptedAnswer.text: Do as the officer tells you.

comment.text: Do as the officer tells you.

answerExplanation.text: You must obey any traffic direction, order, or signal given by a traffic officer, peace officer, or firefighter, even if it conflicts with existing signs, signals, or laws.

Low beam headlights.

hasPart.name: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed?

about.name: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed?

hasPart.assesses: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed? | You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When leaving an interstate, you should maintain your speed until you enter the deceleration lane, at which point you should reduce your speed to the exit ramp's posted advisory speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: About halfway through the deceleration lane.

comment.text: About halfway through the deceleration lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: As you approach the deceleration lane.

comment.text: As you approach the deceleration lane.

suggestedAnswer.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

comment.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

acceptedAnswer.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

comment.text: Immediately upon entering the deceleration lane.

answerExplanation.text: When leaving an interstate, you should maintain your speed until you enter the deceleration lane, at which point you should reduce your speed to the exit ramp's posted advisory speed.

comment.text: You are preparing to exit the interstate. When should you start reducing your speed? | When leaving an interstate, you should maintain your speed until you enter the deceleration lane, at which point you should reduce your speed to the exit ramp's posted advisory speed.

hasPart.text: It is never a good idea to leave a child unattended in a car. It is illegal to leave a child age six or younger unattended in a vehicle. A child may be left under the supervision of a person age 12 or older.

suggestedAnswer.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

comment.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

suggestedAnswer.text: If they are supervised by a person twelve years of age or older.

comment.text: If they are supervised by a person twelve years of age or older.

suggestedAnswer.text: Only if the key is in the ignition.

comment.text: Only if the key is in the ignition.

acceptedAnswer.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

comment.text: Even if they are secured in a child passenger restraint system.

hasPart.name: Blue traffic signs offer information on:

about.name: Blue traffic signs offer information on:

hasPart.text: Blue signs on the roadway are service signs. They are used to provide information about motorist services, such as upcoming rest areas, food options, or nearby hospitals.

hasPart.text: After coming to a full stop, vehicles should proceed through a four-way stop in the order in which they arrive to the intersection. If multiple vehicles arrive at the same time, the vehicle on the left must yield the right-of-way to the vehicle on the right.

comment.text: On your left.
Who arrived before you.
Across from your vehicle.
Who arrived before you.

answerExplanation.text: After coming to a full stop, vehicles should proceed through a four-way stop in the order in which they arrive to the intersection. If multiple vehicles arrive at the same time, the vehicle on the left must yield the right-of-way to the vehicle on the right.

comment.text: At an intersection with stop signs on all corners, yield the right-of-way to any driver: | After coming to a full stop, vehicles should proceed through a four-way stop in the order in which they arrive to the intersection. If multiple vehicles arrive at the same time, the vehicle on the left must yield the right-of-way to the vehicle on the right.

0.10% -- One-tenth of one percent
0.05% -- Five-hundredths of one percent
0.08% -- Eight-hundredths of one percent

hasPart.name: This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles:

about.name: This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles:

hasPart.assesses: This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles: | This white sign means you should not pass other vehicles: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A white rectangular sign indicates that you must obey the stated rule. This sign means that drivers should not pass other vehicles for any reason.

suggestedAnswer.text: Until after you pass the sign.

comment.text: Until after you pass the sign.

suggestedAnswer.text: Unless it seems safe to do so.

comment.text: Unless it seems safe to do so.
For any reason.
For any reason.

answerExplanation.text: A white rectangular sign indicates that you must obey the stated rule. This sign means that drivers should not pass other vehicles for any reason.

hasPart.assesses: What does this road sign mean? | What does this road sign mean? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This sign indicates that the road may be slippery when wet. Exercise caution when driving on a slippery road.

comment.text: Winding road
Loose gravel
Slippery when wet
Slippery when wet

answerExplanation.text: This sign indicates that the road may be slippery when wet. Exercise caution when driving on a slippery road.

hasPart.name: When changing lanes, you can check your blind spot by:

about.name: When changing lanes, you can check your blind spot by:

hasPart.assesses: When changing lanes, you can check your blind spot by: | When changing lanes, you can check your blind spot by: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Even if your vehicle is properly equipped with mirrors, there are blind spots that cannot be seen by using the mirrors. Before changing lanes, look over your shoulder to check these areas.

comment.text: Using the inside rearview mirror.

suggestedAnswer.text: Turning your head and looking over your shoulder.

comment.text: Turning your head and looking over your shoulder.
Using your side mirror.

acceptedAnswer.text: Turning your head and looking over your shoulder.

comment.text: Turning your head and looking over your shoulder.

answerExplanation.text: Even if your vehicle is properly equipped with mirrors, there are blind spots that cannot be seen by using the mirrors. Before changing lanes, look over your shoulder to check these areas.

comment.text: When changing lanes, you can check your blind spot by: | Even if your vehicle is properly equipped with mirrors, there are blind spots that cannot be seen by using the mirrors. Before changing lanes, look over your shoulder to check these areas.

hasPart.name: When driving in fog, you should use your:

about.name: When driving in fog, you should use your:

hasPart.assesses: When driving in fog, you should use your: | When driving in fog, you should use your: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is best to postpone driving until a fog clears. However, if you must drive in the fog, you should do so slowly and use your windshield wipers and low beam headlights.

comment.text: Fog lights only.
High beams.
Low beams.
Low beams.

answerExplanation.text: It is best to postpone driving until a fog clears. However, if you must drive in the fog, you should do so slowly and use your windshield wipers and low beam headlights.

comment.text: When driving in fog, you should use your: | It is best to postpone driving until a fog clears. However, if you must drive in the fog, you should do so slowly and use your windshield wipers and low beam headlights.

hasPart.name: Having a driver license is a:

about.name: Having a driver license is a:

hasPart.assesses: Having a driver license is a: | Having a driver license is a: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: It is important to remember that driving is a privilege and that all drivers play a role in ensuring that everyone remains safe on the roadways. If you prove to be abusive of that privilege, the privilege may be revoked.

comment.text: Requirement.
Privilege.
Right.
Privilege.

answerExplanation.text: It is important to remember that driving is a privilege and that all drivers play a role in ensuring that everyone remains safe on the roadways. If you prove to be abusive of that privilege, the privilege may be revoked.

comment.text: Having a driver license is a: | It is important to remember that driving is a privilege and that all drivers play a role in ensuring that everyone remains safe on the roadways. If you prove to be abusive of that privilege, the privilege may be revoked.

hasPart.name: When you see this black and yellow sign, it means:

about.name: When you see this black and yellow sign, it means:

hasPart.assesses: When you see this black and yellow sign, it means: | When you see this black and yellow sign, it means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign tells drivers to slow down and prepare for an abrupt change in direction at an extreme angle.

suggestedAnswer.text: The road to the right is for one-way traffic only.

comment.text: The road to the right is for one-way traffic only.

suggestedAnswer.text: There is a detour to the right due to road construction.

comment.text: There is a detour to the right due to road construction.

suggestedAnswer.text: The road ahead changes direction at an extreme angle.

comment.text: The road ahead changes direction at an extreme angle.

acceptedAnswer.text: The road ahead changes direction at an extreme angle.

comment.text: The road ahead changes direction at an extreme angle.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign tells drivers to slow down and prepare for an abrupt change in direction at an extreme angle.

comment.text: When you see this black and yellow sign, it means: | Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. They alert you to conditions that are immediately ahead. This sign tells drivers to slow down and prepare for an abrupt change in direction at an extreme angle.
